prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with elegant features and a serene expression.
Show me a bipedal creature that blends fighting and psychic powers in its design.
Imagine a Pokemon that can float gracefully with a mix of pink and yellow colors.
Generate a unique Pokemon inspired by traditional martial arts, featuring a vibrant color palette.
Design a character that embodies balance and harmony, showcasing both strength and wisdom.
Make a playful yet strong Pokemon that thrives in grassy forests and urban areas.
Give me a fighting-type Pokemon adorned with decorative elements and a peaceful demeanor.
